subject: Medicine
title: The Fake Knee Surgery Study
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Fake Knee Surgery Study.

hook.text: In 2002, a bold study tested whether knee surgery was real.

buildup.text: Patients with arthritis got real or sham surgery randomly.

discovery.text: Surgeons made incisions but did nothing in the sham group.

twist.text: Both groups reported equal improvement two years later.

climax.text: The study ended a procedure performed on thousands yearly.

punchline.text: A fake operation exposed a real fraud.

quiz.question: What was the key finding of the 2002 knee surgery study?
options: Sham surgery worked as well as real surgery
